text: Michael Walker is a Paralympic athlete who won five gold medals representing Great Britain. Walker won gold in four category C4 track and field events at the 1988 Summer Paralympics in Seoul, South Korea: the shot put, the discus, the club throw and the javelin. He retained the shot put title in Barcelona 1992. ==References== Category:Paralympic gold medalists for Great Britain Category:Medalists at the 1988 Summer Paralympics Category:Medalists at the 1992 Summer Paralympics Category:Paralympic medalists in athletics (track and field) Category:Athletes (track and field) at the 1988 Summer Paralympics Category:Athletes (track and field) at the 1992 Summer Paralympics Category:Paralympic athletes of Great Britain
title: Michael Walker (Paralympian)
